props.name: FAW Truck Mexico
props.description: Worked on an internal solution for the employees to manage the information of each truck that enters for maintenance or any service, using AWS to store images and data and Typescript and React for the frontend.

props.name: Magnum.ai
props.description: Magnum.AI was a NFT project based on the Solana Blockchain to bring technological value to the holders, working to build new functionalities as the art-upgrader and staking. My main responsibility is to build all the UI, connect and interact with the programs (smart contract) using React and libraries like solana web3.js to build the Magnum.AI ecosystem.
